main event: Two metallic disc-like objects were observed flying over Russellville, Alabama, on August 24, 1958.
interesting points: The objects were described as metallic and very brilliant in color., They made no sound during the observation., The objects changed directions at high speed and appeared to stop momentarily., The sighting duration was between 2 to 3 minutes., This report was submitted to the WPFS Air Force Base and forwarded for investigation.
witness description: Mr. R. D. Johnson, an employee of the Alabama Power Company
